NG0300:1: 'di ltar sangs rgyas pa'i dus na /
NG0300:2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NG0300:3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs
NG0300:4: pa rgyal ba kun gyi gtso bo /
NG0300:5: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa /
NG0300:6: bde ba chen po mya ngan las 'das pa /
NG0300:7: ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku /
NG0300:0: [(]16[)]@#// chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0300:9: 'gag pa med cing rol pa chen po'i sku /
NG0300:10: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis /
NG0300:13: mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang */
NG0300:14: dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa /
NG0300:15: gnas kyi mchog / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang */
NG0300:16: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las /
NG0300:17: skye ba dang 'gag pa'i tshul gyis /
NG0300:18: ye shes la ye shes rol pa dang */
NG0300:19: chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa dang */
NG0300:20: sku skye ba med pa dang */
NG0300:22: thugs mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag mang po dang */
NG0300:23: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gsal ba rtog pa med pa dang */
NG0300:24: gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid dang */
NG0300:25: ma 'dres pa so sor rtog pa dang */
NG0300:26: dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje dang */
NG0300:28: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang */
NG0300:31: stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang snang ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
NG0300:32: de'i tshe rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NG0300:33: chos kyi sku la bskul ba ni /
NG0300:35: ma skyes gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku //
NG0300:36: ma nor ma bcos chos dbyings spros dang bral //
NG0300:37: brdal ba chen pos yongs la rang bzhin gnas //
NG0300:38: de nyid ma rtogs ma rig 'khor ba las //
NG0300:39: thabs mkhas thugs rje chen pos bstan du gsol //
NG0300:40: zhes pa'i tshul gyis zhus pas /
NG0300:41: chos kyi sku las rang byung du gsungs pa /
NG0300:42: e ma ye nas sangs rgyas ka dag rang bzhin kyang *//
NG0300:43: 'on kyang ma rig rtog pa'i blo 'khrul pas //
NG0300:44: gzung 'dzin log rtog sdug bsngal 'khyams pa las //
NG0300:45: ye dag ye grol ye sangs rgyas pa'i don //
NG0300:46: ma rtog blo la brjod med don nyid bstan //
NG0300:48: phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las /
NG0300:49: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ///
NG0300:50: / de nas rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NG0300:51: chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba 'di lta ste //
NG0300:52: ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang *//
NG0300:53: 'jig rten khams kun ye nas dag pa'i gnas //
NG0300:54: bzang ngan gnyis med dus shes rtogs pa'o //
NG0300:55: sems nyid yid bzhin dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung *//
NG0300:56: rnam shes sna tshogs ye shes rtogs pa'i 'khor //
NG0300:57: bdag nyid sangs rgyas snang la rang bzhin med //
NG0300:58: bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par rol //
NG0300:59: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin sna tshogs rol //
NG0300:61: ba de nyid sems las byung *//
NG0300:62: mi rtog ye shes rnam rtog bgegs rnams sel //
NG0300:63: chos kun rang bzhin rnam dag 'od gsal dang *//
NG0300:64: chos rnams thams cad ye nas stong zhing dben //
NG0300:65: ngang ngam shugs kyis rang bzhin thugs rje 'byung *//
NG0300:66: sems nyid skye med cho 'phrul yi ger shar //
NG0300:67: 'byung ba lnga ni chos nyid yum gyi mkha' //
NG0300:68: nyon mongs lnga dag ye shes lnga ldan zhing *//
NG0300:69: srid pa gsum ston rdo rje phur pa'i lha //
NG0300:70: ye shes khro bo ngang dang shugs las grub //
NG0300:71: gnyis med tshul gyis ma gshegs srid par byon //
NG0300:72: bla med dbyings kyi ngang du ro gcig thim //
NG0300:73: chos nyid bde chen skye med brjod dang bral //
NG0300:74: thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro kun dbyings su sdud //
NG0300:75: ma brtags bzhin du ye nas lhun gyi grub //
NG0300:76: kun bzhi rnam shes 'og min gnas su sbyor //
NG0300:77: de tshe khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las bsgral /
NG0300:78: de ltar don shes rig cing rtogs pa'i tshe //
NG0300:79: sku gsung thugs kyi sa la nges par phyin //
NG0300:80: phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las /
NG0300:81: ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u+u ste gnyis pa'o ///
NG0300:82: / de nas rig pa ye shes kyis //
NG0300:83: chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba las //
NG0300:84: chos nyid ngang las rang sgrar shar ba'o //
NG0300:86: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la //
NG0300:87: tshig dang yi ger bstan med brjod dang bral /
NG0300:88: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston par byed //
NG0300:89: brjod med de nyid rjod pa kun gyi mchog / tshig kun gsal byed ye shes las byung ba //
NG0300:90: byin gyis rlabs kyis rab tu rtogs par byed //
NG0300:91: dngos po'i chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong *//
NG0300:92: stong pa ma yin sems kyi snang bar shar //
NG0300:93: de la rang bzhin med de chu zla bzhin //
NG0300:94: snang stong gnyis med lta ba rnam par dag /
NG0300:95: rang bzhin 'od gsal nyon mongs ngang gi dag /
NG0300:96: spros pa'i mtha' bral rnam pa yongs cir min //
NG0300:97: rig pa 'gag med sna tshogs rol pa che //
NG0300:98: gzung 'dzin rnam rtog sdug bsngal dbyings su shar //
NG0300:99: de la mtshan ma'i skyon gyis ma gos par //
NG0300:100: sgro skur bral ba'i ye shes chen po ste //
NG0300:101: lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen kun spyod kyang *//
NG0300:102: log rtog 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor shar //
NG0300:103: ma rig log rtog de nyid gnas su dag / gnyis med chos sku mi rtog ye shes yin //
NG0300:104: rig 'dzin skal pa can gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
NG0300:105: de ni sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa mnyam //
NG0300:106: rgyun gyi khyad par gyis kyang 'phags pa yin //
NG0300:107: don dam phur pa'i rang bzhin byang chub sems //
NG0300:108: ngo bo chos sku skye med rnam par dag / mtshan nyid gnyis med bde chen zug rngu zhi //
NG0300:109: nges tshig dag pa'i mgo phur kun las dpa' //
NG0300:110: dbye na don dam rnam grangs ma yin dang *//
NG0300:111: dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid chos kyi sku //
NG0300:112: skye med bde chen ma skyes dmigs med bral //
NG0300:113: ye nyid ji bzhin zab pa yang dag don //
NG0300:117: phur pa gsang ba'i don rgyud las /
NG0300:118: de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste
NG0300:119: gsum pa'o // // de nas yang rig pa'i ye
NG0300:120: shes kyis / chos kyis dbyings la bskul ba rang byung 'di skad do //
NG0300:121: thog mar shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs pas //
NG0300:122: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dbab pa dang *//
NG0300:123: blta ba'i sgro 'dogs bcad cing la bzlas te //
NG0300:124: ting 'dzin nyams kyi drod tshad shugs las 'byung *//
NG0300:125: byang chub sems kyi don la 'dris par bya //
NG0300:126: mnyam pa nyid kyi don la blo bzhag ste //
NG0300:127: gzung 'dzin bag chags mtshan ma dag par bya //
NG0300:128: dngos po thams cad mi rtog zil gyis mnan //
NG0300:129: nyon mongs kun kyang dbang du bya zhing blang *//
NG0300:130: bsgom du med pa'i don nyid rtogs par bya //
NG0300:131: yang na sangs rgyas dgongs pa rnal du dbab //
NG0300:132: mnyam nyid ngang la dus gsum rgyun du gnas //
NG0300:133: phyi rol yul gyi zhen pa bcad byas la //
NG0300:134: don dam skye med chos kyi dbyings su bsgom //
NG0300:135: chos nyid rig pa'i ye shes dag la ni //
NG0300:136: shes pa sangs stongs ji bzhin je gsal bsgom //
NG0300:137: rnam par mi rtog ye nas skye med las //
NG0300:138: skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang shar //
NG0300:139: cir yang ma yin cir snang chos kyi sku //
NG0300:140: stong nyid snang ba snang ba stong pa nyid //
NG0300:141: so so ma yin tha dad med par bslab //
NG0300:142: nyams blang tshe na lus ngag bcos su med //
NG0300:143: sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra ste rnam rtog bral //
NG0300:144: rtogs pa'i gdeng ldan chos nyid gtan la dbab //
NG0300:145: gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su dag / rig pa byang chub sems nyid rtogs nas kyang *//
NG0300:146: rang bzhin ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku //
NG0300:147: snang la rang bzhin med pa 'ja' tshon 'dra //
NG0300:148: chu zla lta bu'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ldan //
NG0300:149: thugs kar dpal be'u yi ge 'bru dgu ni //
NG0300:150: gser la 'phra bkod bzhin du gsal bsgoms te //
NG0300:151: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gdams ngag tshul bzhin bsgom //
NG0300:152: rgod na skye med rmugs na chos nyid la //
NG0300:153: 'phro na bde chen bying na khro bo ste //
NG0300:154: ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
NG0300:155: 'dzab kyi dgongs pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin no //
NG0300:156: chos nyid ngang las sngags kyi sgra dbyangs blang *//
NG0300:157: sems 'dzin bsam gtan ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgom //
NG0300:158: dbyings kyi ngang las rang byung rang grags bsam //
NG0300:159: de tshe rnam rtog dgra chen thams cad kun //
NG0300:160: gzung 'dzin mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su phur //
NG0300:161: gdeng ldan rnal 'byor nyes pas ma gos pas //
NG0300:162: snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig bsad bcad pa //
NG0300:163: zhe sdang rang rgyud sems kyis ma yin te //
NG0300:164: byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NG0300:165: rtogs pa klong du gyur pas dbyings su sgrol //
NG0300:166: ting 'dzin drod tshad las su rung gyur na //
NG0300:167: nam yang nyes pa'i skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur //
NG0300:168: sgrol bar rang rgyud las kyi srin por skyes //
NG0300:170: pas dmyal khams bco brgyad du //
NG0300:171: bskal pa grangs med gsum du sdug bsngal myong *//
NG0300:172: de bas rnal 'byor phal gyis byar mi rung *//
NG0300:173: phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las /
NG0300:174: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ///
NG0300:175: / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos dbyings dam pa'i sku la rig ye shes kyis bskul ba /
NG0300:176: rang byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
NG0300:177: chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa phur pa'i don //
NG0300:178: rgyu 'bras gnyis las 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
NG0300:179: don dam chos nyid rang byung phur pa ni //
NG0300:180: phur ni chos dbyings pa ni mya ngan 'das //
NG0300:181: phur ni ye shes pa nyid byang chub sems //
NG0300:182: thugs rje chen po'i phur pa bla ma'i don //
NG0300:183: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sems kyi mtshan nyid yin //
NG0300:184: rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi bla med pa //
NG0300:185: man ngag nges pa'i ngo bo kun dang bral //
NG0300:186: don dam brjod med blta ru med pa yin //
NG0300:187: skye dang 'gag med gzung dang 'dzin pa med //
NG0300:188: gsal la 'grib med 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don //
NG0300:189: mtha' bral sgro skur 'khor 'das gnyis su med //
NG0300:190: snang stong dbyer med tha dad med pa'i don //
NG0300:191: theb shor med cing gsal la rnam rtog bral //
NG0300:192: chos kyi dbyings kyis gzung 'dzin gnyis la gdab //
NG0300:193: mya ngan 'das pas 'khor ba'i chos la gdab //
NG0300:194: ye shes chen pos mnyam pa nyid la gdab //
NG0300:195: byang chub sems kyis shes rab thabs la gdab //
NG0300:196: thugs rje'i phur pa 'gro drug kun la gdab //
NG0300:197: bla ma chen pos snod dang don la gdab //
NG0300:198: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog la gdab //
NG0300:199: sems kyi sems nyid rtogs pa'i blo la'o //
NG0300:200: dbyings la btab pas don rnams rdzogs par byed //
NG0300:201: sems la btab pas rig pa'i ye shes shar //
NG0300:202: chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gdab //
NG0300:203: de lta'i don gyis theb pa gyur pa'i tshe //
NG0300:204: 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mya ngan 'das par bzla //
NG0300:205: sdug bsngal de nyid chos nyid byang chub sems //
NG0300:206: rnam rtog las ni ye shes skye 'gyur zhing *//
NG0300:207: dmyal ba'i gnas nyid 'og min bla med gnas //
NG0300:208: de tshe ma lus phur pa gdab ces bya //
NG0300:209: don dam nges par gyur pa lta ba yin //
NG0300:210: gsal ba rnam rtog bral ba bsgoms pa yin //
NG0300:211: bya bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa 'bras bu yin //
NG0300:212: zhen chags 'dzin pa med pa spyod pa yin //
NG0300:213: 'khor 'das gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin //
NG0300:214: thugs rje'i gzungs kyis 'dzin na sgrol ba yin //
NG0300:215: don gnyis lhangs kyis rtogs na theb pa yin //
NG0300:216: gang du mi rtog 'dzin pa dam tshig yin //
NG0300:217: theb shor med pa'i don rtogs man ngag yin //
NG0300:218: mngon du gyur na mngon sum dkyil 'khor yin //
NG0300:219: don gnyis nyams su lon na ting 'dzin yin //
NG0300:220: gnas su bstab pa mchod pa chen po yin //
NG0300:221: byar med lhun gyis grub pa phrin las yin //
NG0300:222: rig pa gdeng du gyur pa dbang mchog ste //
NG0300:223: des na thams cad ma lus phur pa'i @#//
NG0300:225: phur ni skye med pa ni 'gag pa med //
NG0300:226: phur ni gzung med pa ni 'dzin med don //
NG0300:227: phur ni ye shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings //
NG0300:228: phur ni thabs chen rdo rje yab kyis mkha' //
NG0300:229: pa ni shes rab pha rol phyin ma yum gyi klong *//
NG0300:230: chos nyid dbyer med phur pa'i don gnyis kyis //
NG0300:231: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thams cad dbyings su bsgral //
NG0300:232: stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun bsgral ba'i zhing *//
NG0300:233: bsgral bya sgrol byed chos nyid gnyis su med //
NG0300:234: de yi don ni rang byung phur pa'i don //
NG0300:236: phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las /
NG0300:237: rang byung phur pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ///
